entry.title: FOG ADVISORY , Whitecourt
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:52 AM MST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -7.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Whitecourt Airport 04:00 AM MST Thursday 12 January 2023
Temperature: -7.3°C
Pressure: 102.0 kPa
Humidity: 100 %
Wind Chill: -12
Dewpoint: -7.3°C
Wind: ESE 10 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 4.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Fog patches. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 12 this morning and minus 6 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Thursday 12 January 2023
